.NET Framework 3.5.name: VRTK_StraightPointerRenderer
.NET Framework 3.5.summary: The Straight Pointer Renderer emits a coloured beam from the end of the object it is attached to and simulates a laser beam.
.NET Framework 3.5.remarks: It can be useful for pointing to objects within a scene and it can also determine the object it is pointing at and the distance the object is from the controller the beam is being emitted from.
.NET Framework 3.5.example: VRTK/Examples/003_Controller_SimplePointer shows the simple pointer in action and code examples of how the events are utilised and listened to can be viewed in the script VRTK/Examples/Resources/Scripts/VRTK_ControllerPointerEvents_ListenerExample.cs
